fintechFundamentals.title: Fintech Fundamentals
fintechFundamentals.subtitle: Master the Complete Journey of Financial Technology
fintechFundamentals.description: A comprehensive 11-phase program designed to take you from understanding the foundations of financial systems to building production-ready fintech solutions.

overview.title: Course Overview
overview.description: This program covers everything from the philosophical foundations of money to practical system architecture. Whether you're a developer, entrepreneur, or finance professional, you'll gain the knowledge to innovate in the fintech space.

comprehensive.title: Comprehensive Curriculum
comprehensive.description: From theory to practice across all fintech domains

practical.title: Practical Knowledge
practical.description: Real-world examples and case studies from the industry

expert.title: Expert Insights
expert.description: Learn from practitioners with deep industry experience

phase1.title: Foundation Before Money
phase1.subtitle: Why We Need Financial Systems
phase1.description: Explore the fundamental reasons behind the existence of financial systems. Understand the problems they solve and why they are essential for modern society.

phase2.title: What is Money, Really?
phase2.subtitle: Understanding the Nature of Money
phase2.description: Dive deep into the concept of money - its history, evolution, and the various forms it takes today. Learn about fiat currency, digital money, and value storage.

phase3.title: Ledgers & Accounting
phase3.subtitle: The Backbone of Financial Records
phase3.description: Master the art of financial record-keeping. Understand double-entry bookkeeping, digital ledgers, and how transactions are recorded and verified.

phase4.title: Banks from the Inside
phase4.subtitle: How Financial Institutions Operate
phase4.description: Get an insider's view of how banks work. Learn about their organizational structures, core operations, and the technology that powers them.

phase5.title: Payments
phase5.subtitle: The Art of Moving Money
phase5.description: Understand how money moves between parties. Learn about payment processing, clearing, settlement, and the various payment instruments used today.

phase6.title: Payment Rails & Networks
phase6.subtitle: Infrastructure That Powers Transactions
phase6.description: Explore the underlying infrastructure of payment systems. Learn about SWIFT, card networks, real-time payments, and how they interconnect globally.

phase7.title: Digital Wallets
phase7.subtitle: The Future of Personal Finance
phase7.description: Discover how digital wallets work. From e-wallets to mobile payment apps, understand the technology, security, and user experience design.

phase8.title: Compliance & Risk
phase8.subtitle: Navigating Regulatory Landscapes
phase8.description: Learn the critical aspects of regulatory compliance in fintech. Master KYC, AML, data protection, and risk management frameworks.

phase9.title: Investment
phase9.subtitle: Democratizing Wealth Building
phase9.description: Explore investment platforms and products. Learn about robo-advisors, trading systems, and how fintech is transforming wealth management.

phase10.title: Cryptocurrency
phase10.subtitle: Blockchain and Digital Assets
phase10.description: Understand blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies. Learn about Bitcoin, Ethereum, DeFi, and the regulatory landscape of digital assets.

phase11.title: Building Fintech Systems
phase11.subtitle: From Concept to Production
phase11.description: Put it all together and learn how to architect and build fintech solutions. Cover system design, API integration, security, and scaling strategies.

instructor.title: About the Program
instructor.description: This program is designed by fintech practitioners with years of experience in the Saudi financial technology ecosystem, combining theoretical knowledge with practical industry insights.

enrollSection.title: Ready to Start Your Fintech Journey?
enrollSection.description: Join our comprehensive program and gain the knowledge to innovate in the financial technology space.
